mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(member_id, reservation_no, restaurant_no, review_detail, scope_taste, scope_kind, scope_clean, avg_scope) VALUES ( #{member.memberId}, #{reservation.reservationNo}, #{restaurant.restaurantNo}, #{reviewDetail}, #{scopeTaste}, #{scopeKind}, #{scopeClean}, #{avgScope})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW AS r RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT rev.REVIEW_NO, COUNT(rep.REVIEW_NO) AS report_count FROM REPORT as rep RIGHT OUTER JOIN REVIEW as rev ON rep.REVIEW_NO = rev.REVIEW_NO GROUP BY rev.REVIEW_NO ) AS COUNT_REP ON COUNT_REP.REVIEW_NO = r.REVIEW_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT review_no, image FROM image) AS i ON (r.review_no = i.review_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT review_no, hl.hashtag_no, h.hashtag FROM HASHTAG_LOG AS hl, HASHTAG AS h WHERE hl.hashtag_no = h.hashtag_no) AS h ON (r.review_no = h.review_no) INNER JOIN (SELECT member_id, nickname, profile_image FROM Member) AS m ON (r.member_id = m.member_id) WHERE r.review_no = #{reviewNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT r.review_no, r.member_id, r.reservation_no, r.restaurant_no, r.review_detail, r.review_reg_date, r.review_show_status, r.scope_taste, r.scope_kind, r.scope_clean, r.avg_scope, M.MARK_NO FROM review AS r Inner join(select review_no, mark_no, member_id from MARK where member_id = #{member.memberId}) as m on (m.review_no = r.review_no) where r.review_show_status = 1 ORDER BY M.mark_no DESC limit 0, 8)AS re LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT image, review_no FROM image) AS i ON (re.review_no = i.review_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT hl.HASHTAG_no, h.hashtag, review_no FROM HASHTAG_LOG as hl, HASHTAG as h WHERE hl.hashtag_no = h.hashtag_no) AS hh ON(re.review_no = hh.review_no) INNER JOIN (SELECT member_id, nickname, profile_image FROM Member) AS m ON (re.member_id = m.member_id);
SELECT hashtag_no, hashtag FROM HASHTAG WHERE HASHTAG Like CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')

SELECT mark_no, member_id, review_no FROM MARK WHERE review_no IS NOT NULL
AND member_id = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MARK WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo};
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM review r INNER JOIN (SELECT review_no FROM MARK WHERE member_id = #{value} and review_no IS NOT NULL ORDER BY mark_no) as m on (r.review_no = m.review_no) where r.review_show_status = 1;
